con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ccgw2.1" targetNamespace="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="ccgw2.1-notification.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--https://ccgw.orange.pl/api/2.1--> <!--SUBSCRIPTION--> <wsdl:message name="SubscriptionNotificationRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:activate-subscription-request" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubscriptionNotificationResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:activate-subscription-response" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--UNSUBSCRIPTION--> <wsdl:message name="UnsubscriptionNotificationRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deactivate-subscription-request" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UnsubscriptionNotificationResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deactivate-subscription-response" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="NotificationPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="SubscriptionNotification"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubscriptionNotificationRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SubscriptionNotificationResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UnsubscriptionNotification"> <wsdl:input message="tns:UnsubscriptionNotificationRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:UnsubscriptionNotificationResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="NotificationSoap" type="tns:NotificationPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SubscriptionNotification"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UnsubscriptionNotification"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="NotificationService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:NotificationSoap" name="NotificationPort"/> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" elementFormDefault="qualified" jxb:version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" xmlns:jxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="notification/NotificationRequest.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="notification/NotificationResponse.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="activate-subscription-request" type="SubscriptionNotificationRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="activate-subscription-response" type="SubscriptionNotificationResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="deactivate-subscription-request" type="UnsubscriptionNotificationRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="deactivate-subscription-response" type="UnsubscriptionNotificationResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" elementFormDefault="qualified" jxb:version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" xmlns:jxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb"> <xsd:complexType name="SubscriptionNotificationRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subscriptionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subscriber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="activationDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="assent-for-activation" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UnsubscriptionNotificationRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subscriptionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="subscriber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="activationDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="assent-for-activation" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" elementFormDefault="qualified" jxb:version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://ccgw.vas.gtp.pl/service/NotificationService/v10" xmlns:jxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb"> <xsd:complexType name="SubscriptionNotificationResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="status" type="status"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UnsubscriptionNotificationResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="status" type="status"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="status"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="errorCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="errorParam" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
